post.author: 황선용
post.content:
http://jobs.workopolis.com/jobshome/db/work.job_posting?pi_job_id=5648130&pi_search_id=182511923&pi_sort=POST_DATE&pi_curjob=9&pi_maxjob=41

workopolis.com에 나온 구인 광고 입니다. 보신 분들도 물론 계시겠죠?
물론 저와는 아무런 관계 없는 회사입니다.   ^^

--------------------------------------------------------------------

NADISCORP LOGISTICS GROUP INC.  
Programmer Analyst  
  
Location: Brampton,ON  
Job Category: Computers-Software  
Industry: Logistics  
Company URL: http://www.nadiscorp.com  
Year(s) of Experience: 3  
Number Of Positions: 1  
Date Posted: Jul 4, 2002  
Contact E-mail:  info@nadiscorp.com  
  
   Nadiscorp Logistics Group is a supply chain outsourcing organization coast-to-coast in Canada. Our company is currently seeking a Programmer Analyst as a permanent member of our IT team. The candidate we’re looking for should be familiar with our industry, and possess knowledge of the following systems:

AS/400, RPG/400, QUERY/400, CL, SQL, WORLD WRITER, CRYSTAL REPORTS, and EDI

Other Skills related to the job: Strong in developing reports, strong in implementations, a self-starter, yet a team player, a creative thinker, a problem solver, organized, and have a strong work ethic.

Consultant: Carol Smye
E mail: info@nadiscorp.com


Contact E-mail:  info@nadiscorp.com
post.title: RPG Programmer Analyst
